Name: Nahida
Title: "Physic of Purity" Nahida
Desc: The panacea brings purity, and from the palace depths is spring renewed.
Source: Reward for inviting Nahida to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

17032.Name: All Schemes to Know
17032.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], applies <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117031]</color> to target character. If the target character already has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117031]</color> applied to them, then apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117031]</color> to all opposing characters instead.

C117031.Name: Seed of Skandha
C117031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> Deals 1 $[K5] to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

17033.Name: All Schemes to Know: Tathata
17033.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Applies <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117031]</color> to all opposing characters.

C117031.Name: Seed of Skandha
C117031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After any character who has a Seed of Skandha takes Elemental Reaction DMG:</color> Deals 1 $[K5] to the character(s) to which the Seed of Skandha is attached on the same side of the field.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C117032.Name: Shrine of Maya
C117032.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character triggers an Elemental Reaction: </color>+1 additional DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
